title: Treasury Wine Shares Fall 17% After Flagging US, China Slowdown
description: Treasury Wine Estates Ltd.’s stock sank after the company announced an overhaul including asset sales and cost cuts, as the Penfolds producer tackles weakening demand in its key markets.
content: Treasury Wine Estates Ltd.’s stock sank after the company announced an overhaul including asset sales and cost cuts, as the Penfolds producer tackles weakening demand in its key markets.
